name: Kaachan Miso (500g)
highlight: Rich Toyono-town miso, perfect travel souvenir.
description: Traditional miso from Toyono Town, known for its rich and slightly sweet flavor profile. Perfect for home cooking or as a souvenir.

name: Marusan Miso (500g)
description: Premium miso from Nagano prefecture, offering deep umami flavors. Ideal for hearty soups and stews.

name: Ishino White Miso (500g)
description: A mild and creamy white miso from Kyoto, perfect for light dishes and dressings.

name: Yamago Miso (500g)
description: Well-balanced miso from Yamanashi with a natural sweetness. Great for everyday cooking.

name: Hozan Miso (500g)
description: A full-bodied miso from Aichi prefecture, rich in flavor. Perfect for bold dishes.

name: Kantoya Miso (500g)
description: Traditional Tokyo-style miso with an earthy and robust character. A must-have for authentic Japanese cooking.
